starwars.entities

Class Blaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
      • starwars.SWEntity
        • starwars.entities.Blaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface

    public class Blaster
extends SWEntity
    An entity that has the WEAPON attribute and so can be used to Attack others, etc.
    Author:
    dsquire
    See Also:
    starwars.entities.Reservoir}, starwars.actions.Chop}, starwars.actions.Attack}

    • Constructor Detail

      • Blaster

        public Blaster(MessageRenderer m)
        Constructor for the Blaster class. This constructor will,
        • Initialize the message renderer for the Blaster
        • Set the short description of this Blaster to "a blaster"
        • Set the long description of this Blaster to "A shiny blaster pistol"
        • Set the hit points of this Blaster to 100
        • Add a Take affordance to this Blaster so it can be taken
        • Add a WEAPON Capability to this Blaster so it can be used to Attack
        Parameters:
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        See Also:
        starwars.actions.Take}, starwars.Capability}

    • Method Detail

      • getSymbol

        public java.lang.String getSymbol()
        A symbol that is used to represent the Blaster on a text based user interface
        Specified by:
        getSymbol in interface SWEntityInterface
        Overrides:
        getSymbol in class SWEntity
        Returns:
        Single Character string "s"
        See Also:
        starwars.SWEntityInterface#getSymbol()}

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)
        Method insists damage on this Blaster by reducing a certain amount of damage from this Swords hitpoints

        This method will also change this Blasters longDescription to "A broken sword that was once gleaming" and this Blasters shortDescription to "a broken sword" if the hitpoints after taking the damage is zero or less.

        If the hitpoints after taking the damage is zero or less, this method will remove the CHOPPER and WEAPON capabilities from this Blaster since a broken sword cannot be used to Chop or Attack.

        Specified by:
        takeDamage in interface SWEntityInterface
        Overrides:
        takeDamage in class SWEntity
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of hitpoints to be reduced
        See Also:
        starwars.actions.Attack}
